sec.p: Branches with leaves (64 g) were hand-cut into small pieces (~ 2 cm) and then hydrodistillated for 3 hours in a Clevenger-type apparatus, using n-pentane as collection solvent. The oil was dried by anhydrous sodium sulphate, filtered and stored at 4 Â°C until its chemical analysis and pharmacological tests. The essential oil yield was 49.8 mg (0.08%).
